statements: SELECT * FROM building_blueprints;
SELECT blueprint_name, architect_name FROM building_blueprints;
SELECT * FROM building_blueprints WHERE architect_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT blueprint_id, building_type FROM building_blueprints ORDER BY blueprint_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT building_type FROM building_blueprints;
SELECT blueprint_name, architect_name FROM building_blueprints WHERE building_type = 'Residential' ORDER BY architect_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM building_blueprints WHERE architect_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY blueprint_id DESC;
SELECT blueprint_id, architect_name, building_type FROM building_blueprints WHERE building_type = 'Commercial' AND architect_name <> 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM building_blueprints WHERE architect_name='Johnson' AND blueprint_content->>'status' = 'approved' ORDER BY blueprint_id ASC;

SELECT blueprint_id, blueprint_name, building_type FROM building_blueprints WHERE blueprint_name LIKE '%house%' AND building_type IN ('Residential', 'Commercial') ORDER BY blueprint_name ASC, blueprint_id DESC;
SELECT id, name, specialization FROM Architects;
SELECT blueprint_name, architect_id FROM Blueprints;
SELECT id, specialization FROM Architects WHERE id = 3;
SELECT architect_id, blueprint_name FROM Blueprints WHERE architect_id > 100;
SELECT id, specialization FROM Architects ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Architects WHERE specialization = 'Residential' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT blueprint_name FROM Blueprints WHERE architect_id = 1;
SELECT id, name, specialization FROM Architects WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM Architects INNER JOIN Blueprints ON Architects.id = Blueprints.architect_id;
SELECT count(*) AS total_blueprints FROM Blueprints;
SELECT * FROM Architects;
SELECT architect_name, architect_specialization FROM Architects;
SELECT blueprint_name, blueprint_date FROM Blueprints;
SELECT architect_name, blueprint_name, blueprint_date FROM Architects JOIN Blueprints ON Architects.architect_id = Blueprints.architect_id;
SELECT category_name FROM Categories;
SELECT architect_name FROM Architects WHERE architect_specialization = 'Interior Design';
SELECT blueprint_name, blueprint_date FROM Blueprints WHERE architect_id = 3 ORDER BY blueprint_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Architects JOIN Blueprints ON Architects.architect_id = Blueprints.architect_id WHERE Architects.architect_specialization = 'Landscape Design' ORDER BY blueprint_date ASC;

SELECT architect_name, COUNT(blueprint_id) AS total_blueprints FROM Architects JOIN Blueprints ON Architects.architect_id = Blueprints.architect_id GROUP BY architect_name HAVING total_blueprints > 2;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(blueprint_id) AS total_blueprints FROM Blueprints JOIN Categories ON Blueprints.blueprint_id = Categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_blueprints < 5;
SELECT * FROM architects;
SELECT building_name, location FROM buildings WHERE architect_id = 1;
SELECT blueprint_data FROM blueprints WHERE building_id = 3;
SELECT user_name FROM users WHERE user_email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT architect_name, architect_email FROM architects ORDER BY architect_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM architects;
SELECT building_name, location, year_built FROM buildings ORDER BY year_built DESC;

SELECT architects.architect_name, buildings.building_name, blueprints.blueprint_data FROM architects JOIN buildings ON architects.architect_id = buildings.architect_id JOIN blueprints ON buildings.building_id = blueprints.building_id;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_buildings FROM buildings WHERE year_built > 1990;
SELECT * FROM Architects;
SELECT name, email FROM Architects WHERE specialty = 'Civil';

SELECT b.name, a.name as architect_name, c.name as company_name FROM Buildings b LEFT JOIN Architects a ON b.architect_id = a.architect_id LEFT JOIN Construction_Companies c ON b.location = c.location;
SELECT building_id, construction_date FROM Buildings WHERE construction_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT c.name, start_date, end_date FROM Contracts con LEFT JOIN Construction_Companies c ON con.company_id = c.company_id;
SELECT name, specialty FROM Architects;
SELECT buildings.name, architects.name, construction_date FROM Buildings JOIN Architects ON Buildings.architect_id = Architects.architect_id;

SELECT Contracts.contract_id, Buildings.name, Construction_Companies.name AS company_name, start_date, end_date FROM Contracts JOIN Buildings ON Contracts.building_id = Buildings.building_id JOIN Construction_Companies ON Contracts.company_id = Construction_Companies.company_id;
SELECT blueprint_id, Buildings.name AS building_name, blueprint_data FROM Blueprints JOIN Buildings ON Blueprints.building_id = Buildings.building_id;
SELECT architect_id, name, email, specialty FROM Architects ORDER BY name DESC;
